job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Job Title: Senior Software Engineer Location: Philadelphia, PA or New York, NY Required Technology And Skills 5 years of software development experience with focus on web-based applications and full-stack development for both customer facing UI and backend services Experience developing software in LAMP stack with PHP preferable utilizing Symfony. Experience developing with a UI framework, Ember.js preferred or React and Anuglar Experience with Linux configuration Some experience with different PHP runtimes Hands on experience with relational databases – MySQL preferred. Prefer database design and query development Experience maintaining and improving distributed systems Nice To Have Skills Experience developing a REST API. Knowledge of Docker and containers. Experience working with AWS services Experience with CI/CD preferred Jenkins Salary And Compensation $120,000-$140,000 Bonus Benefits And Perks Ability to work remote 401K match Client Our client is a Fortune 500 firm that specialize in software solutions for the edtech and health tech space Please email jpillion@talener.com for more information or to apply.
